nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:enchanted_book","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Enchanted Book\",\"color\":\"white\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Piercing I\",\"color\":\"blue\"}","{\"text\":\"Arrows travel through enemies.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"The extra targets hit take \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"25%\",\"color\":\"green\"}]}","{\"text\":\"of the damage.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Use this on an item in an Anvil\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"to apply it!\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Source:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"I: \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"Enchantment Table\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Applied To:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Bow\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"COMMON\",\"color\":\"white\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"PIERCING;1","enchantments":"{piercing:1"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{}}}
